examples:
Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: During this time I didn’t know you could do refunds and this is when I thought I canceled my subscription I didn’t use Cavan during this time so I would like my money back because I haven’t used it

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I didn't not use the program enough to continue my subscription. I cannot afford to continue paying. I am very limited on expenses. please refund me the money so I can by what my baby needs. I am not working at the moment. Your attention is greatly appreciated during this time. Thank you

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Only used once and didn’t like it.  I thought I had cancelled my subscription but was still charged.  I would appreciate a refund since I will not be using this and cannot afford during this pandemic.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I thought I had requested to cancel the subscription a month after it had renewed. I remember sending a cancellation and didn’t realize it was continuing to charge my card. I am 18 and am already struggling with money during the pandemic. Is there by chance I can get atleast this refund or even the past 3-4months?

Invoice No .: <NUMBER>Reason for the refund request: Hello, I just saw that I was charged € 11.99 by Canva. The concern being that when I subscribed, to benefit from the 30-day trial, which means that I should have been charged on the 12th. In addition, during my subscription, I was assured by advertising, that I will receive a notification a few days before to be sure of my subscription, which I did not receive. Therefore I would like to be reimbursed, as I have no interest at this time in using the paid version of Canva. Thanking you. Cordially. M ALPHONSE Matthias.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I didn’t realize I was being charged & never used the service during this time. Meant to cancel before the trial ended.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I didn’t realize I was being charged & never used the service during this time. Meant to cancel before the trial ended.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello Canva team, 
I hope you guys are doing well during the pandemic. I subscribed canva pro to get some help for my small business. I thought I cancelled it properly but I found out Canva charged me $155.88 just a few min ago and the cancelling process seems didn't go through properly. I would be happy if you help me with my refund request since my business is not during well during this time. Thank you.
Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I didn’t plan to renew my subscription, I didn’t use much during the first month of subscription and I don’t need it

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I don't have enough money to pay for the subscription right now, because I am a college student and I just paid for my textbooks during the time I got charged. So now my account is negative. I would greatly appreciate it if I can get a refund please.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I just cancelled my subscription and do not have enough to pay for canva pro. I am a college student and do not have excess money during these tough times. I thought I had an extra day to cancel the subscription. Please let me know what I can do.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was just charge while I was trying to cancel my subscription. I’m not using lately Canva and I can’t afford to pay this during a pandemic.

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I have been charged when I cancelled during free trial

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I tried to cancel during my free trial and it must not have gone through. Can you help?

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I would need a refund as i have only used the pro subscription during its trial stage. After using it once during the trial stage and finishing what i need to use it for, i have ni longer used it since. I have canceled my subscription as soon as I saw the email for the auto renewal. I really need the refund as i cannot afford the subscription and after the currency conversion the money paid for the subscription renewal amounts to a lot.
Invoice Number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I made a mistake and did not want to continue using Canva during this time.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I don't know if I selected  the most recent charge, but I only use Canva during the semester and forgot to cancel, and I cannot afford extra charges as I am an unemployed college student. Can you please refund these funds to me? Thank you.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I had forgotten to cancel my subscription and I have not used Canva pro during the time period of this invoice

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I am asking for the full refund due to a couple of reasons:
1. I havent used- even open Canva for an extended period time, over a month.
2. Because of the covid-19 I was hospitalized and then had to move to another city and I lost access to my email- so I couldn't log in or change to forgotten password to unsubscribe and avoid paying the subscriptions.
3. My economical situation got much worse due to the Pandemic, so even 11.99€ may seem like not much, but in my case it is a lot, especially when I didn't use the platform and was unable to log in to cancel the subsciption on time.
<NAME> to covid-19 I have many medical bills to pay,so every € is an enourmous help for me.
5.thank you in advance, thank you thank you.

5.thank you in advance, thank you thank you.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I have tried canceling this numerous times. Ideally I would like a refund for the past two charges. I haven't used any of the pro services during this time.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I did not use the paid features during this time and was intending to cancel my subscription. I would greatly appreciate if this December fee could be refunded. Regards, <NAME>

Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Hello! If possible, I would like to ask for a refund for the unused period. Thanks a lot in advance!
